casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Adam Warren CONLEY 75P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2019 Emily H. Davis, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Conley, Adam Warren. John R. Green, Jr., Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of March 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of March 2019."
